meanings.sent1: The business deal was very lucrative, bringing in a lot of money.
meanings.sent2: Investing in real estate can be quite lucrative if done wisely.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a dog walking itself to earn money is quite lucrative!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a lucrative treasure, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The golden sunsets over the ocean painted a lucrative picture of beauty.

meanings.sent1: Starting a lemonade stand in summer can be a lucrative business.
meanings.sent2: It is lucrative to save money for a rainy day.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a lucrative spot in the sun to nap all day.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was like a lucrative shortcut to success.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies was a lucrative invitation to the neighbors.
